thread.section_title: The Natural Sapphire Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Natural Sapphire Company | www.thenaturalsapphirecompany.com
thread.title: Jamie M
thread.title_full: The Natural Sapphire Company reviewed by Jamie M

author: Jamie M
title: Jamie M
text:
All aspects of service and quality generally excellent. I was particularly impressed with the shipping arrangements. Product quality excellent and service was, quite genuinely, excellent, especially post-purchase to pre-delivery support.
One area for improvement, given the large variation that exists in certification from various bodies, products would benefit from standardised certification from a respected independent body, e.g. GIA. This was available as a supplement on request, but if it was included as standard, this would have been a 5/5 review without hesitation.
